Committee: Cultural Affairs, Tourism, Parks And Recreation

Milestones.Committee: Cultural Affairs, Tourism, Parks And Recreation

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

Title: Relates to developing criteria and guidelines for state designated arts and cultural districts
Summary: Directs the council on the arts to establish criteria and guidelines for the establishment of state designated arts and cultural districts.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the arts and cultural affairs law and the economic development law, in relation to creating the arts and cultural district
